title: Looking to purchase s74 sils with paper ad backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Looking to purchase s74 sils with paper ad backs
posts.post_content: Hello I am looking to purchase S-74 silks with paper advertising backs. If anyone has some that they would consider selling I would like to hear what players and what backs you have

I have nice ones for sale here  (below)...Good luck in the quest. Finding the Helmar backed one will be the toughest.....
 
[url]http://www.luckeycards.com/tobacco.html[/url]
